name: Roanoke
description: Roanoke is an isometric colony simulator in which the player is capable of gathering resources, building, and upgrading existing structures. Each action performed increases resource count, or hourly/daily resource incomes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
